content:
%"alloc::string::String" = type { [0 x i64], %"alloc::vec::Vec<u8>", [0 x i64] }

Does anyone know what is the purpose of [0 x i64] at the beginning and the end of the struct? And seems like this situation also is pretty common in almost for every Rust's struct....
In this particular case it could be omitted, probably, but its easier to just emit it for all fields, than not to.
